Package controller.state.edit

Class PreEdit

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.state.Phase
      • controller.state.edit.EditPhase
        • controller.state.edit.PreEdit
  • public class PreEdit
extends EditPhase
    PreEdit is inherited from the EditPhase class to support commands valid in pre editing phase
